generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and arrows, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right edge of the road, bordered by a curb and some vegetation.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background, including a multi-story white building on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the road and in the background, providing greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead, with some showing red and others green.
- traffic sign: Road signs are visible on the right side of the road, indicating directions to various locations.
- car: Several cars are visible, including a red car parked on the right side of the road and a white van further down the road.
- bus: A white bus is visible on the left side of the road, traveling in the opposite direction.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
